skills.name: Basic Workflow
skills.pattern:
# .github/workflows/ci.yml
name: CI
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm test

skills.name: Triggers
skills.pattern:
on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize]
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 0 * * *'
  workflow_dispatch:

skills.name: Matrix
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  test:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest]
        node: [18, 20]
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ matrix.node }}

skills.name: Secrets
skills.pattern:
steps:
  - name: Deploy
    env:
      API_KEY: ${{ secrets.API_KEY }}
    run: ./deploy.sh

skills.name: Environment
skills.pattern:
env:
  CI: true
jobs:
  build:
    env:
      NODE_ENV: test
    steps:
      - run: echo "value=1.0" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
        id: vars

skills.name: Caching
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/cache@v4
  with:
    path: ~/.npm
    key: ${{ runner.os }}-node-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}

# Or with setup-node
- uses: actions/setup-node@v4
  with:
    cache: 'npm'

skills.name: Artifacts
skills.pattern:
- uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
  with:
    name: build
    path: dist/

- uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
  with:
    name: build

skills.name: Dependencies
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
  test:
    needs: build
  deploy:
    needs: [build, test]

skills.name: Conditionals
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  deploy:
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    steps:
      - if: github.event_name == 'push'
        run: ./deploy.sh

skills.name: Outputs
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    outputs:
      version: ${{ steps.v.outputs.value }}
    steps:
      - id: v
        run: echo "value=1.0" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
  deploy:
    needs: build
    steps:
      - run: echo ${{ needs.build.outputs.version }}

skills.name: Services
skills.pattern:
services:
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15
    env:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
    ports:
      - 5432:5432
    options: --health-cmd pg_isready

skills.name: Docker Build
skills.pattern:
- uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3
- uses: docker/login-action@v3
  with:
    username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USER }}
    password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASS }}
- uses: docker/build-push-action@v5
  with:
    push: true
    tags: user/app:latest

skills.name: Release
skills.pattern:
on:
  push:
    tags: ['v*']
jobs:
  release:
    steps:
      - uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v1
        with:
          files: dist/*.zip
          generate_release_notes: true

skills.name: Deploy
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  deploy:
    environment:
      name: production
      url: https://app.com
    steps:
      - uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_KEY }}
          aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET }}
          aws-region: us-east-1
      - run: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://bucket

skills.name: GitHub Pages
skills.pattern:
permissions:
  pages: write
  id-token: write
environment:
  name: github-pages
  url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
steps:
  - uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v2
    with:
      path: dist/
  - uses: actions/deploy-pages@v3
    id: deployment

skills.name: Reusable
skills.pattern:
# reusable.yml
on:
  workflow_call:
    inputs:
      node-version:
        type: string
    secrets:
      npm-token:
        required: true
jobs:
  build:
    steps:
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: ${{ inputs.node-version }}

skills.name: Composite Action
skills.pattern:
# action.yml
name: Setup
inputs:
  node-version:
    default: '20'
runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: ${{ inputs.node-version }}
    - run: npm ci
      shell: bash

skills.name: Concurrency
Permissions
skills.pattern:
permissions:
  contents: read
  issues: write
  pull-requests: write

skills.name: PR Automation
skills.pattern:
on:
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize]
jobs:
  lint:
    steps:
      - run: npm run lint
  label:
    steps:
      - uses: actions/labeler@v4

skills.name: Issue Automation
skills.pattern:
on:
  issues:
    types: [opened]
jobs:
  welcome:
    steps:
      - uses: actions/github-script@v7
        with:
          script: |
            github.rest.issues.createComment({
              issue_number: context.issue.number,
              owner: context.repo.owner,
              repo: context.repo.repo,
              body: 'Thanks for the issue!'
            })

skills.name: Schedule
skills.pattern:
on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 0 * * *'  # Daily
    - cron: '0 */6 * * *' # Every 6h

skills.name: Container Job
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    container:
      image: node:20-alpine
      env:
        NODE_ENV: test

skills.name: Self-hosted
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: [self-hosted, linux, x64]

skills.name: Status Checks
skills.pattern:
# Branch protection:
# Settings > Branches > Add rule
# Require status checks: test

skills.name: Timeouts
skills.pattern:
jobs:
  build:
    timeout-minutes: 30
    steps:
      - run: npm run build
        timeout-minutes: 10
      - run: npm test
        continue-on-error: true

skills.name: Context
skills.pattern:
steps:
  - run: |
      echo "Ref: ${{ github.ref }}"
      echo "SHA: ${{ github.sha }}"
      echo "Actor: ${{ github.actor }}"
      echo "Repo: ${{ github.repository }}"

skills.name: Expressions
skills.pattern:
env:
  IS_MAIN: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' }}
steps:
  - if: contains(github.event.head_commit.message, '[skip ci]') == false
    run: npm test

skills.name: Debug
skills.pattern:
# Set secret: ACTIONS_STEP_DEBUG = true
steps:
  - run: |
      echo "::debug::Debug message"
      echo "::warning::Warning"
      echo "::error::Error"

skills.name: Best Practices
